item.title: NIF event: Ohad Naharin on BDS, Israel-Palestine and the Sydney Festival
item.description: Over the last month, calls to boycott the Sydney Festival after it received sponsorship from the Israeli embassy for a production of Naharinâ€™s Decadance have featured prominently on social and mainstream media.
